summary: Mod that majorly increases the power of some of the worst weapons in the game.
descriptionHtml:
Essentially a cheat mod I created to make all of the weak, useless weapons a lot more powerful.

They all do 40-50 DPS. The woodcutter\'s axe does Soul Trap, the pickaxe paralyzes, and the shiv does fire damage. They all never run out of enchantment. The weapons can be found on the floor when you walk into Breezehome, in Whiterun.
author: IronPlatypus
